title: Button Group Component Contract
description: Contract extracted from Figma Untitled UI Button Group component. This defines all required properties that the LIT component must implement.

source.notes: Extracted via Figma Desktop MCP get_design_context + get_screenshot

buttonGroup.description: Container component that groups multiple button items horizontally

icon.description: Icon variant for the entire group (Figma-level prop)
icon.notes: In code, each item manages its own icon variant independently

selected.description: Whether this item is the currently active/selected item
selected.notes: Maps from Figma 'Current' property. Changes background to gray-50 and text to darker gray

icon.notes: Controls what icon/element appears. 'dot' shows a colored circle indicator

notes: Button Group is an interactive component with hover, focus, and disabled states
Items are separated by right borders, container has rounded corners
The 'selected' state (Current in Figma) highlights the active item
Icon-only items have smaller horizontal padding (12px vs 16px)
Leading icon items show icon + text with 8px gap
Container has box-shadow xs and 8px border-radius
All items must be keyboard navigable (roving tabindex pattern recommended)
Button Group uses two sub-components: container and base item
Container handles border-radius, shadow, and overflow clipping
Base items handle content, states, and right-border separators
get_design_context returned React+Tailwind code which was converted to LIT patterns
